title: Riot is baised, Account banned for unproper reasoning
body:
When you just want to have a fun game and of course there is that one person trolling. Throughout this game a certain player decides to troll and feed cause they think its funny, they then proceed to feed every lane, you would think it would stop there, nope. They then start grief, and telling the enemy team where you are, initially helping the enemy. Your other teammates are annoyed with this ask this player to stop. So as any annoyed player would i begin to typed back asking why they do this, there response cause its funny. I became very annoyed with this player and began ask why they would do this, ask the other team to report them, things you would normally do. 

Then riot decides to perma ban me, thanks riot staff, you ban a player just wanting to enjoy the game and play but keeps those that troll, feed, and annoy other players. What a great company, they should change the way they advertise their game, since obviously people trolling is what this company wants.
